Sesderma Beauty Treats Hyaluronic Gummy Mask x1

Sesderma Beauty Treats Hyaluronic Gummy Mask is a peel-off mask with hydrating properties that is mixed on the spot and applied with a spatula.

Price: SAR30.51
or buy now with instant checkout
 

In stock

Order now and get it between next Tuesday March 15th and Thursday March 17th in Saudi Arabia with DHL Express Shipping.

  • Add to Wishlist

Click here to see more products from Sesderma

Details

Sesderma Beauty Treats Hyaluronic Gummy Mask is an innovative jelly-like mask that is prepared on the spot. Combined with hyaluronic acid, hydrolyzed collagen is able to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and boost hydration. This means that the skin will become firmer and softer, with the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines reduced. Additionally, the ritual of preparing and applying the mask makes it fun and you should totally take the 25 minutes of waiting to take a few selfies with your gummy-like mask.

Characteristics

  • Texture: jelly;
  • Skin issues: dehydration, sensitivity;
  • Time of application: 1x/week;
  • Age: 15+;
  • Skin type: all skin types;
  • Main benefits: hydrating, soothing, antiaging;
  • Formulated without: parabens.

Main Ingredients

  • Hyaluronic acid deeply hydrates the skin and additionally helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines;
  • Hydrolyzed collagen boosts the elasticity of the skin;
  • Seaweed extract soothes the skin.

How to use

Firstly, gently cleanse your skin and pat it dry. Then, use the mixing tray and the spatula to mix the step 1 hyaluronic gel with the step 2 activating cream. Thirdly, use the spatula to apply an even layer of Sesderma Beauty Treats Hyaluronic Gummy Mask on the face, avoiding the eye contour, letting it sit 20-25 minutes. Lastly, peel it of like a gummy and enjoy your deeply hydrated skin.

Additional Info
